description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of CFB Gagetown (DND) has a requirement for a Reginal Individual Standing Offer for Mould Remediation. The work covered under this standing offer agreement covers the supply of all labour, material and equipment required for mould remediation for Minimum, Moderate and Maximum Precaution Remediations on an as and requested basis located within 5 CDSB Gagetown and the Training Area as directed by the Departmental Representative for CFB Gagetown, Oromocto, NB.The term for this standing offer is for two (2) years from April 1,2024 to March 31,2026.The estimated value for this opportunity is in the range of $100,001 to $500,000.00.
full_summary:
# Regional Individual Standing Offer W6898-240684_A - Mould Remediation
## Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites contractors to submit proposals for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RI-SO) for Mould Remediation services. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing all necessary labour, material, and equipment for mould remediation, with varying levels of precaution, at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick.

### Scope of Work
The RI-SO will cover the supply of all necessary services for mould remediation, including:

* Minimum, Moderate, and Maximum Precaution Remediations
* Labour, material, and equipment required for the remediation process
* Work to be performed at CFB Gagetown and the Training Area, as directed by the Departmental Representative

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: Wednesday, February 6, 2024, 2:00 PM (AST)
* **Publication Date**: January 17, 2024
* **Estimated Value**: $100,001 to $500,000.00 CAD
* **Term**: 2 years, from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2026
* **Service Locations**: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick

### Evaluation Criteria
Submissions will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price, as per the Due Diligence report (Appendix 2).

### Notice and Documentation
The complete Tender Notice, including Appendices, can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery platform at the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18544211?extsite=MTg1NDQyMTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18544211?extsite=MTg1NDQyMTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or requests for clarification, please contact Gary Bryant, PWGSC Director, at:

gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

We look forward to receiving your proposals. Please ensure that all submissions are complete and submitted in accordance with the requirements outlined in the Tender Notice.

---
